page.title: 18Eppleby W.I. CP
page.content: Eppleby W.I. is held in Eppleby village hall. It started in 1926 with at least 36 people but now there are 23{members}aged 25-70. They come from Eppleby, Caldwell, Forcett, East Layton, West Layton and the adjoining farms. It is on the fourth Tuesday of every month at 7pm. The{meetings}start with the members singing Jerusalem. They talk about business and they have demonstrations. They have a social half hour. In 1981 and 1984 they won the area cup in the group competition. { This year}they are having a visit to a candle factory and a Voluntary Council Officer from head-quarters is going to talk to them. Also they are having a Christmas party, gardening tips, Microwave Cookery, Broomstick Crocheting, Antiques, beauty hints and a talk on Lewis Carroll.
